title: HTTP Endpoint Task From Step Function with SAM
description: Create a Step Functions workflow that calls an API using the HTTP Endpoint task.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Start the Step Function with the latitude and longitude of the location you want to get the temperature from in the input payload.
The step function will call the API using the HTTP Endpoint task and check what type of jacket you will need.
You will get the execution ARN and the start date.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Andres Moreno
authors.bio: Andres is a principal software engineer for Tyler Technologies. Andres has been working with Serverless on AWS since 2018 and is big on API First and Serverless First patterns.
